name: Necropocalypse
description:
Necropocalypse is a game where you create a dungeon to gather enough bones to consume the entire world! Every time you reform your dungeon may be ruined, but you come back closer to your goal! Good luck my Undeadness...

Controls:
- WASD to pan around
- Scroll Wheel to Zoom in and out
- Left Click to mine
- Right Click to place Traps
- Escape to exit to menu
- Number keys 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 to change selection of trap during the editing phase and to activate traps during the Wave Phase.

Gameplay: To start mine out a path with Left Click. Then add in Traps, use the number keys to choose your desired Traps. When happy with your route, select the lich with '6' and right click to place. Start Scouting to check if the route is valid. If valid, the wave will start. Pressing the trap buttons 1, 2, 3 will activate the traps during the Wave Phase. Skeletons don't need to be activated!
